app.title: Bodhi
app.panel:
established 21 years ago and located in the heart of sydney with indoor and outdoor dining in a unique tranquil parkland settings under giant moreton bay fig trees.

bodhi is a critically acclaimed award winning restaurant that pioneered and specialises in vegan yum cha and pan-asian cuisine

with a wine list carefully selected from australia's finest boutique growers that are either certified organic, bio-dynamic or vegan, to complement our cuisine and go hand in hand with our philosophy of being an environmentally sustainable business

using locally grown produce, everything is freshly prepared daily and hand crafted by some of sydney's best asian chefs

with a stunning setting and venue that seat up to 300 people we can cater for anything from an intimate dinner for two to exclusive events, product launches, private parties, weddings and corporate functions.

the bodhi can cater for all different types of functions and event be it a small, intimate sit-down birthday dinner through to a large celebration of up to 300 people

we can help organise your event both from a catering perspective but also we can assist you with props, set designing or booking live performing artists (for example – fire dancers, snake charmers, henna tattooists, belly dancers etc.)

if you need any suggestions or help please ask – we don’t charge any venue hire fees so you can max out your budget on food and drink!
